text: Iskrenne veruyushchim, sovershayushchim dobrodeyaniya v etoy, blizhney zhizni, bud' to muzhchiny ili zhenshchiny, My daruyem blagodatnuyu, prekrasnuyu zhizn', i oni budut dovol'ny i terpelivy k nevzgodam zhizni i priznatel'ny Allakhu za Yego milost'. A v budushchey zhizni My vozdadim im prekrasnoy dvoynoy nagradoy za ikh deyaniya v blizhney zhizni
